page.title: 17BILLINGE LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: In Billinge there many grassy areas for playing on, but hayfever sufferers would have to stay clear of them. There are youth clubs in Billinge which have activities. The Young Ornithologists meet regularly, there are cubs, brownies, scouts, guides, sea cadets which hold weekly meetings. A karate club at Main Street old school, with judo at Birchley Club. Dancing classes are also held at the old school. There are also public tennis courts in one of the parks where the public can play for nothing. The Birchley Club also have football teams which play in the local leagues, the club also have disco's every so often. Asports centre or swimming baths would be an added advantage for leisure, but people would come from miles away and spoil the atmosphere.
